alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT COOK...NORTHWESTERN BERRIEN... EASTERN COLQUITT AND SOUTHERN TIFT COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lenox, or 10 miles northwest of Adel, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Adel, Moultrie, Sparks, Enigma, Omega, Norman Park, Lenox, Ty Ty, Alapaha, Unionville, Phillipsburg, Berlin, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Eldorado, Massee, Greggs, Flat Ford, and Wagon Wheel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
